Segment | Full-Stack Software Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-Time | http://www.segment.com

Segment’s mission is to make it super easy for companies to use their customer data to build incredible products. We’re building towards a future where all customer data in the world flows through Segment.

As a Full Stack Engineer, you are essential to that future. You will work closely with designers to build the user interface that sits in front of the infrastructure that receives billions of API calls every day. We use cutting-edge tools like React, Webpack, Redux, and ES6. Some of our team specializes in CSS, some of us specialize in Go, but all of us are JavaScript experts and full stack engineers.

If you're interested, please apply at http://grnh.se/6vyhiu1 or feel free to email me at steven@segment.com.
